overview_of_class: The purpose of the course is to develop teachers’ understanding of and openness to growth as leaders by helping them to think insightfully about leadership and identify strategies to improve their effectiveness as leaders in schools. We will achieve this in two ways: (1) by implementing, reflecting upon, and redesigning a leadership routine ("action-observation-reflection") to accomplish established goals at teachers’ school sites, and (2) by examining various aspects of leadership that can facilitate teachers’ personal leadership practice and development.
name: Practicum in School Leadership I
title: SESP MS_ED 460-1-20 Practicum in School Leadership I

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: The purpose of the course is to develop teachers’ understanding of and openness to growth as leaders by helping them to think insightfully about leadership and identify strategies to improve their effectiveness as leaders in schools. We will achieve this in two ways: (1) by implementing, reflecting upon, and redesigning a leadership routine ("action-observation-reflection") to accomplish established goals at teachers’ school sites, and (2) by examining various aspects of leadership that can facilitate teachers’ personal leadership practice and development.
